channel.title: Demonstrations on Divest Vanderbilt
channel.description: Recent content in Demonstrations on Divest Vanderbilt

item.title: Dores Divest hosts Earth Day ‘oil spill’ demonstration in front of Library Lawn
item.description: Members of Dores Divest, student volunteers and around 40 student spectators gathered around the Harold Stirling Vanderbilt statue in front of Library lawn at 1:30 p.m. CDT for an “Earth Day Oil Spill” demonstration.

item.title: Dores Divest Protest Vanderbilt Institute for Energy and Environment Closing
item.description: Students from Dores Divest met late in the night Sunday, Mar. 14, to post flyers in prominent areas around campus in response to a Vanderbilt Hustler article announcing that the Vanderbilt Institute for Energy and Environment (VIEE) would be permanently closing on June 30.

item.title: DivestVU, Dores Divest hold an over 30-person protest at Kirkland Hall
item.description: DivestVU and Dores Divest held an approximately 30-person protest today from 2:15 to 3 p.m. CST. The protestors marched from Library Lawn to Kirkland Circle in support of divestment of the university endowment from fossil fuels.
